name: df-ptdf
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1
body: |- wceq(cptdfc(c0, c1), cmpt(s0, cr, cima(co(co(cv(s0), ctimesr, co(c1, cminusr, c0)), cpv, c0), ctp(nat1, nat2, nat3))))
comment: Define the predicate ` PtDf ` , which is a utility definition used to shorten definitions and simplify proofs. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 15-Jul-2012.)
